org.ogcs.app

接口 Session

  • 所有超级接口:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable
    所有已知实现类:
    NetSession

    public interface Session
extends java.lang.AutoCloseable
    Session.

    When player connect to server. server will be create a session for everybody. The session control the connection and player's data.

    从以下版本开始:
    1.0
    版本:
    2017.07.07
    作者:
    TinyZ.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void active()
      the session active event.
      io.netty.channel.Channel channel()
      Get the netty's channel
      void close()
      Close netty's channel.
      Connector getConnector()
      Get the player
      void inactive()
      the session inactive event.When the netty channel inactive.
      boolean isActive()
      Is session is active
      void offline()
      when player logout, call this method to clear player data.
      void setConnector(Connector connector)
      Set Connector.
      void writeAndFlush(java.lang.Object msg)
      Send message back without listener.
      void writeAndFlush(java.lang.Object message, io.netty.channel.ChannelFutureListener listener)
      Send message back with listener.

    • 方法详细资料

      • channel

        io.netty.channel.Channel channel()
        Get the netty's channel
        返回:
        return netty's channel

      • isActive

        boolean isActive()
        Is session is active
        返回:
        Return true if the session is active. otherwise false.

      • getConnector

        Connector getConnector()
        Get the player
        返回:
        Return player

      • setConnector

        void setConnector(Connector connector)
        Set Connector. After player login, should set the player.
        参数:
        connector - The player

      • writeAndFlush

        void writeAndFlush(java.lang.Object msg)
        Send message back without listener.
        参数:
        msg - The message will be send

      • writeAndFlush

        void writeAndFlush(java.lang.Object message,
                   io.netty.channel.ChannelFutureListener listener)
        Send message back with listener.
        参数:
        message - The message will be send

      • active

        void active()
        the session active event. When the netty channel active. the session will be trigger active event.

      • inactive

        void inactive()
        the session inactive event.When the netty channel inactive. the session will be trigger inactive event.

      • offline

        void offline()
        when player logout, call this method to clear player data.

      • close

        void close()
        Close netty's channel.
        指定者:
        close 在接口中 java.lang.AutoCloseable
